subject: Problems using @BeforeClass with parallel methods
msgSnippet: Hi, It is my understanding that @BeforeClass is supposed to run before any of the @Test methods contained in the same class. When I run my code in sequential
messageBody:
Hi,

It is my understanding that @BeforeClass is supposed to run before any of the @Test methods contained in the same class. When I run my code in sequential mode, everything works fine, but when I enable parallel mode I am seeing that @BeforeClass no longer runs before the tests.

I am using JUnit 4.8.1 using this POM configuration under Maven:

<groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
<artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
<version>2.7.1</version>
<configuration>
<excludes>
<exclude>**/TestConfiguration.java</exclude>
</excludes>
<parallel>methods</parallel>
</configuration>

Any ideas?

Thank you,
Gili
